testcase.description:
Test register profile with create account via link in header.
Note: this test case requires testmode on (../xltportal/conf/xltportal.properties -> testMode=On) !!!
# Setup and preparation
- Start session, open homepage and delete all visible cookies
# Scope of test
- Click on login link in the header and go to the create account page - Enter profile data and submit the form - Logout using the link in the header menu - Login again to validate login data and goto the account page - Validate personal profile data - Logout using the global link in the header
